msagent.characters
Class Animation

java.lang.Object
  msagent.characters.Animation

public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an animation which the Microsoft agents can perform, like reading, searching or waving.

Author:
Ramon Hagenaars
See Also:
MSAgent, Genie, Merlin, Peedy, Robby

          Constructor; visible within the package only.

          Returns an Animation object which corresponds to the given Character's name and Animation name.

Constructor Detail

Animation

protected Animation(java.lang.String name,
                    Character character)
Constructor; visible within the package only.

Parameters:
name - the name of the Animation
character - the Character that may perform this Animation
Method Detail

getAnimation

public static Animation getAnimation(Character character,
                                     java.lang.String name)
Returns an Animation object which corresponds to the given Character's name and Animation name. agentPeedy.perform(Animation.getAnimation(Peedy.getInstance(), "blink")); // Will successfully perform the blink-animation agentPeedy.perform(Animation.getAnimation(Peedy.getInstance(), "not_existing_animation")); // Will throw a NullPointerException in the perform method

Parameters:
character - the Character of which the Animation is required
name - the name of the Animation, which is case insensitive
Returns:
an Animation object or null if there is no Animation which corresponds to the given arguments

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this Animation.

Returns:
the name of this Animation as a String

getCharacter

public Character getCharacter()
Returns the Character object that may perform this Animation.

Returns:
the Character object that may perform this Anitmation
